metadata.title: CVE-2019-13290 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Artifex MuPDF 1.15.0 has a heap-based buffer overflow in fz_append_display_node located at fitz/list-device.c, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF file. This occurs with a large BDC property name that overflows the allocated size of a display list node.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-13290` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.15.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.15.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.15.0+ds1-1').
